versionDescription: c-20090516-1607 is speculated to be the first build of Minecraft Classic (Coming after the previous Pre-Classic) builds in which this version marks the start of the 'Private Alpha Test Builds'.
bugs: <irc> There were issues reported about bad mouse movement.
trivia: Many consider this version to be the first of the Minecraft Classic Era.
The URL for Minecraft was given to users Dock and Fartron for testing.
